description: Register new participants and manage existing registrations

label: Recon4IMD participant identifier
description: Select the Recon4IMD participant identifier. The Recon4IMD ID entered here should match that assigned to the participant during sampling and recorded on the related Biospecimen worksheet.
required: if (participantId === null) "Select a Recon4IMD ID for the participant"

label: Select your site
required: if (clinicalSite === null) "Select your clinical site"

label: Date of registration
description: Date the participant was entered into the IMDhub
required: if (dateOfRegistration === null) "Enter the date of registration"

label: Enter the year the participant was born
required: if (yearOfBirth === null) "Enter the year the participant was born"

label: Enter the month the participant was born
required: if (monthOfBirth === null) "Enter the month the participant was born"

label: participant sex
required: if (sexAtBirth === null) "Select the sex of the participant"

label: Cohort assignment
Cohort assignment
description: Select the participant's cohort assignment
required: if (cohortAssignment === null) "Select the cohort that the participant is assigned to"

label: Informed consent
Informed consent given
description: Participants or legal representatives give written informed consent to study participation and consent for the collection and analysis of both blood and urine samples, and where indicated, a fibroblast sample or a stool sample.
required: if (hasGivenInformedConsent === null) "Indicate if the participant has given informed consent"

label: Does the participant agree to the donation of blood samples?
required: if (hasAgreedToBloodSampling === null) "Indicate if the participant agrees to blood sampling"

label: Does the participant agree to the donation of urine samples?
required: if (hasAgreedToUrineSampling === null) "Indicate if the participant agrees to urine sampling"

label: Does the participant agree to the donation of fibroblast samples?
required: if (hasAgreedToFibroblastSampling === null) "Indicate if the participant agrees to fibroblast sampling"

label: Does the participant agree to the donation of stool samples?
required: if (hasAgreedToStoolSampling === null) "Indicate if the participant agrees to stool sampling"

label: Does the participant agree to let us keep their data and samples in a permanent archive for future research related to IMD?
required: if (hasAgreedToFutureReuse === null) "Indicate if the participant has consented to future reuse"

label: If yes, does the participant want to be contacted about future research to give their consent or agree to future research without further consent?
required: if (hasAgreedToRecontact === null) "Select the level of recontact needed for reuse"

columnName: has agreed to recontact for future research
label: Does the participant agree to be contacted in the future to provide additional information and/or biological samples?
required: if (hasAgreedToRecontactForFutureResearch === null) "Indicate if the participant has agreed to recontact for future research"

label: Does the participant agree with the use of their samples for genetic testing?
description: Participant is suspected to have an IMD and was advised on genetic testing.
required: if (cohortAssignment.name === "Test cohort" && hasAgreedToGeneticTesting == null) "Indicate if the participant has agreed to genetic testing"
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Test cohort" ? true : false) : false

label: Does the participant agree to take part in genetic analysis?
description: Particpant is informed of all the risks and benefits.
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (!cohortAssignment.name.includes("Negative") && hasAgreedToGeneticAnalysis === null ? "Indicate if the participant has agreed to genetic analysis" : false ) : false

columnName: has agreed to transfer of genetic data
label: Does the participant agree to allow the transfer of previously generated genetic data to researchers of the study for genetic analysis?
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (!cohortAssignment.name.includes("Negative") && hasAgreedToTransferOfGeneticData === null ? "Indicate if the participant has agreed to the transfer of genetic data" : false ) : false

columnName: has agreed to recontact of medical findings
label: Does the participant agree to be informed about possible medical findings related to their IMD?
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (!cohortAssignment.name.includes("Negative") && hasAgreedToRecontactOfMedicalFindings === null ? "Indicate if the participant has agreed to recontact in the event of medical findings" : false ) : false

columnName: has agreed to recontact of incidental findings
label: Does the participant agree to be informed of incidental findings?
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (!cohortAssignment.name.includes("Negative") && hasAgreedToRecontactOfIncidentalFindings === null ? "Indicate if the participant has agreed to recontact in the event of incidental findings" : false ) : false

label: Participant registry affiliation
Is the participant registered with an existing participant registry or cohort study?
description: Participants enrolled or registered with one of the following participant registries or cohort study (with ethical approval at site): U-IMD, GENOMIT or Solve-RD.
required: if (hasRegistryAffiliation === null) "Indicate if the participant is part of an existing registry, cohort, or study"

label: Select the participant registry or cohort study
description: If the participant is part of a participant registry or cohort study, select the registry.
required: if (hasRegistryAffiliation && participantDataRegistration === null) "Select the project that the participant is part of"

label: Enter the participant identifier in the registry or cohort study
required: hasRegistryAffiliation && participantDataRegistration !== null ? (participantRegistryIdentifier === null  && participantDataRegistration.name !== "Not applicable" ? "Enter the participant's identifer that is used in that project" : false ) : false

label: Exclusion & inclusion criteria check
Is not a suspected or confirmed carrier of an IMD pathogenic variant?
description: Participants have the potential to be or a confirmed carrier of an IMD pathogenic variant.
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" && isNotPotentialImd === null ? "Indicate if the particpant is or is not an potential IMD" : false ) : false
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" ? true : false) : false

label: Does not have a history of IMD, a suspected IMD, or any other condition that could lead to clinically significant secondary metabolic abnormalities?
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" && hasNoHistoryOfImd === null ? "Indicate if the particpant has a history of IMDs" : false) : false
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" ? true : false) : false

columnName: has no history of malignant tumors
label: Does not have a history of malignant tumors?
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" && hasNoHistoryOfMalignantTumors === null ? "Indicate if the particpant has a history of malignant tumors" : false) : false
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" ? true : false) : false

columnName: has no history of clinical systemic diseases
label: Does not have a medical history of clinically significant systemic diseases?
description: E.g., cardiovascular, diabetes, hypertension, respiratory, gastrointestinal, nervous, urinary, endocrine, musculoskeletal, mental disorders, and addiction
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" && hasNoHistoryOfClinicalSystemicDiseases === null ? "Indicate if the particpant has a history of clinical systemic diseases" : false) : false
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" ? true : false) : false

columnName: has no history of infectious diseases
label: Does not have a medical history of chronic systemic infectious diseases?
description: E.g., HIV, infectious hepatitis, tuberculposis, or Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease
required: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" && hasNoHistoryOfInfectiousDiseases === null ? "Indicate if the participant has a history of infectious diseases" : false) : false
visible: cohortAssignment !== null ? (cohortAssignment.name === "Negative control group (healthy)" ? true : false) : false

label: Did not have a blood transfusion within the last month?
description: Participant had a blood transfusion within the last month
required: if (hasRegistryAffiliation && hadNoRecentBloodTransfusion === null) "Indicate if the participant had no recent blood transfusion"

label: Did not undergo haemodialysis within the last month?
required: if (hadNoRecentHaemodialysis === null) "Indicate if the participant had no recent haemodialysis"

columnName: participant is not pregnant or lactating
label: Is not pregnant or lactating?
required: sexAtBirth !== null ? (sexAtBirth.name === "female" && participantIsNotPregnantOrLactating == null ? "Indicate if the participant is pregnant or lacting" : false) : false

label: Registration result

description: An indication that the participant meets selection criteria
An indication that the participant is confirmed with the registry
Registration of visits by participant and date

label: Participant visit identifier
description: To generate the visit ID, please select a participant and the type of visit
required: if (visitId === null) "To generate the visit ID, select a participant and specify the visit type"

label: Recon4IMD participant identifier
description: Enter the Recon4IMD participant identifier. This identifier is generated upon participant registration into the IMDhub.
required: if (participant === null) "Select a participant to create a new visit"

label: Enter the date the participant visited the clinical site
required: if (dateOfVisit === null) "Select the visit date"

label: Is the visit an 'Enrolment visit' or a 'Follow-up visit'?
description: The enrollment visit is the initial study visit of the participant and the follow-up visit is any study visit after the initial study visit.
required: if (visitType === null) "Select the visit type"

label: Was the participant fasting at the time of sample collection?
description: Fasting is when a subject doesn't eat or drink anything other than water only.
required: if (isFasting === null) "Indicate if the participant is fasting"

label: Has the participant consumed alcohol within the last 12 hours?
required: if (hasConsumedAlcohol === null) "Indicate if the participant has consumed alcohol within the last 12 hours"

label: Clinical metadata
description: Demographics

label: Demographic
Patient status
Disease history
Medical history
Date clinical metadata received
Completeness of clinical metadata
Clinical exam, body weight and height at time of visit
Disease signs and symptoms at time of visit
Treatment at time of visit
Laboratory analysis at time of visit

description: Biospecimen registrations by participant and visits

label: Enter the biospecimen identifier printed on the barcode
required: if (biospecimenId === null) "Enter a unique identifier for the biospecimen"

label: Select the biospecimen type collected
description: Every participant should have a registration for plasma and urine
required: if (specimenType === null) "Select the type of biospecimen collected"

label: If the participant weighs less than 10 kg, then enter the weight.
Total volume of blood collection (ml)
required: specimenType !== null && weight !== null ? (["PAXgene-RNA", "EDTA-Blood/DNA"].includes(specimenType.name) && weight < 10 ? "Enter the total volume of the blood draw" : false) : false
visible: specimenType !== null && weight !== null ? (["PAXgene-RNA", "EDTA-Blood/DNA"].includes(specimenType.name) && weight < 10) : false

label: Select the visit where the collection occurred
required: if (dateOfCollection === null) "Select the participant's visit where the biospecimen was collected"

label: Indicate if the sample was collected
required: if (wasCollected === null) "Indicate if the biospecimen was collected"

label: Was the sample collected and processed according to the SOP?
If no, please outline the deviaiton.
required: if (wasCollected && !hasNoProtocolDeviation) "Provide additional information on the protocol deviation"

label: Select aliquots
visible: wasCollected && specimenType !== null ? (["EDTA-Tube/Plasma", "Urine"].indexOf(specimenType.name) > -1 ? true : false) : false

label: Did any other protocol deviation occur during sampling?
description: provide examples; different plastic ware, sample mix up, sample lost, etc.
required: if (wasCollected && hasOtherDeviation === null) "Indicate if any other deviation(s) occurred"

label: If yes, please provide additional information on the deviation
required: if (wasCollected && hasOtherDeviation && (reasonForOtherDeviation === null || reasonForOtherDeviation === "")) "Please provide a reason the deviation(s) occurred"

label: If the sample was not collected, please indicate the reason
required: if (!wasCollected && (reasonNotCollected === null || reasonNotCollected === "")) "Please provide a reason why the sample was not collected"

label: If the specimen is shipped, indicate if the sample was received.
required: if (shipmentRegistration !== null && specimenReceived === null ) "Indicate if the specimen was received at the destination point"

label: If the sample was not receieved, select a value to indicate why
If other was selected, please provide additional information.

description: Mangement of the shipment of biospecimens

label: Enter a unique ID for the shipment
Enter the date of the shipment registration
required: if (dateShipmentCreated === null) "Enter the date the shipment was created"

label: Select the samples included in the shipment
required: if (!biospecimensShipped.length) "Select the samples that are included in this shipment"

label: Select the current status of the shipment
required: if (shipmentStatus === null) "Select the current status of the shipment"

label: Enter the courier service
Enter the tracking number provided by the courier service
Enter the URL to the tracking page provided by the courier service
Enter the name of the person that is responsible for preparing and sending the shipment
Enter the date the shipment was sent
Select the origin point of the shipment
required: if (fromLocation === null) "Select the origin of the shipment"

label: Select the destination point of the shipment
required: if (toLocation === null) "Select the destination of the shipment"

label: Enter the date the shipment was received at the destination point
Enter the name of the person that is responsible for receiving and unpacking the shipment
If applicable, enter additional information about the shipment

description: Information on existing genetic data

label: Select the participant
required: if (participant === null) "Select a participant"

label: Is there whole genome or exome sequencing data of the participant in storage?
Is the previously generated sequencing data of the participant stored with a third party sequence provider, another healthcare provider or the site?
required: if (hasExistingSequenceData && sequencingStorageOption === null) "Select a storage option"

label: What is the name of the third party sequence provider?
visible: hasExistingSequenceData && sequencingStorageOption !== null ? sequencingStorageOption.name === "Third party" : false

label: Select the participant's disease status resulting from previous genetic testing.
required: if (hasExistingSequenceData && affectedStatus === null) "Select the affected status"

label: When was the genetic testing of this sequencing data performed (MM/YY)?
required: if (hasExistingSequenceData && dateOfSequencing === null) "Enter the date of sequencing"

label: Select from the list the sequencing system used? Only systems listed are accepted.
required: if (hasExistingSequenceData && sequencer === null) "Select the sequencing system"

label: What was the sequencing kit used?
visible: hasExistingSequenceData && sequencer !== null ? sequencer.name !== "Not provided" : false

label: Has the sequencing data previously generated been in the form of either FASTQs or CRAM files (in FASTA format), which encompass unmapped reads?
visible: hasExistingSequenceData && sequencer !== null ? sequencer.name !== "Not provided" : false

label: ftp secure transfer of sequencing data
required: if (hasExistingFiles && dateOfSequencing && hasTransferedFiles === null) "Please indicate if files were transfered"

label: Recon4IMD particpant identifier
description: Enter the Recon4IMD participant identifier. This identifier is generated upon participant registration into the IMDhub.

label: Previous history of any surgery?
If yes, what surgery was performed and when did it occur?
Has the participant taken any medications or supplements in last 6 months?
Does the participant have any dietary restrictions or preferences?
What foods has the participant consumed within the last 24 hours?

description: Log of participants that have withdrawn or exited the study

label: Select the participant
required: if (participant === null) "Select a participant"

label: When did the participant come off study?
required: if (offStudyDate === null || offStudyDate === "") "Choose the date of off study"

label: Why is the participant coming off the study?
required: if (offStudyReason === null) "Select a reason"

label: When a participant withdraws their consent, do they want their data used or deleted?
visible: offStudyReason !== null ? offStudyReason.name === "Withdrawal of participant consent" : false

label: When a participant withdraws their consent, do they want their samples to be used, returned or destroyed?
visible: offStudyReason !== null ? offStudyReason.name === "Withdrawal of participant consent" : false

label: If the patient has died, what is the date of death?

description: Log of queries sent and resolved at the site

label: Participant identifier
description: Select the participant the query is pertaining to.
required: if (participant === null) "Select a participant"

label: Date of query
description: Enter the date the query was created
required: if (sponsorDateOfQuery === null || sponsorDateOfQuery === "") "Enter the date the query was sent"

label: Reason for query
description: Provide a short description on why the query is needed
required: if (sponsorRegardingDataentry === null || sponsorRegardingDataentry === "") "Provide a reason for the query"

label: Sponsory query
description: Describe the query. Please provide as much detail as possible
required: if (sponsorQuery === null || sponsorQuery === "") "Please describe the query"

label: Site response
description: Enter the site's response to the query.

label: Query identifier
description: Identifier is automatically created
Site recruitment strategy by IMD IEMbase

label: IMD IEMbase
Prevalence data (number of patients) site specific (adult/pead)
Is the data correct (T/F)
If no, specify prevalence

description: Documents and other files submitted by the site
